snippet: The principal, Randy J. Asher, said school officials had been unaware of any allegations against Sean Shaynak, now charged with sexually preying on seven students, until he was arrested in August.
abstract: Brooklyn Technical High School principal Randy J Asher says school officials were unaware of any allegations against former teacher Sean Shaynak, who is charged with sexually preying on seven students, until he was arrested in August.
lead_paragraph: The principal, Randy J. Asher, said school officials had been unaware of any allegations against Sean Shaynak, now charged with sexually preying on seven students, until he was arrested in August.

headline.main: Brooklyn Tech Principal Addresses Teacher’s Arrest
headline.print_headline: Principal Addresses the Arrest of a Teacher
